item.title: ASML、SAP、Mistral 要求欧盟推迟启动人工智能法案规则
item.description: 包括 ASML Holding NV、SAP SE 和 Mistral AI 在内的欧洲公司呼吁欧盟暂停实施其具有里程碑意义的人工智能法规，因为它们认为该法规会危及欧洲大陆的人工智能雄心。【原文：European companies including ASML Holding NV, SAP SE, Mistral AI have called on the European Union to suspend the implementation of its landmark artificial intelligence regulation because they say it puts the continent’s AI ambitions at risk.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀率意外上升，令瑞士央行松了一口气
item.description: 瑞士 6 月份的消费者物价意外上涨，这给央行带来了喘息的机会，此前，瑞士消费者物价跌破零点，迫使央行结束了一段时间的正借贷成本。【原文：Swiss consumer prices unexpectedly rose in June, offering respite to the central bank after a dip below zero forced it to end a period of positive borrowing costs.】

item.title: 前 OpenAI 董事会成员质疑扎克伯格的人工智能招聘狂潮
item.description: 前 OpenAI 董事会成员、乔治敦大学安全与新兴技术中心战略总监海伦-托纳（Helen Toner）表示，Meta Platforms 公司用于招募顶尖人工智能人才的数百万美元预算可能无法保证成功。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc.’s lavish multimillion-dollar budget for recruiting top AI talent may not guarantee success, said Helen Toner, former OpenAI board member and director of strategy at Georgetown’s Center for Security and Emerging Technology.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战助推欧洲利用货币期权避险
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策造成了比往常更大的价格波动，欧洲企业财务人员越来越多地转向期权市场来对冲货币风险，这种方法比通常使用的方法成本更高。【原文：European corporate treasurers increasingly are turning to the options market to hedge currency exposure, a more costly method than typically used, as Donald Trump’s trade policies cause bigger-than-usual price swings.】

item.title: 风险加剧，世界银行认为泰国将采取更多宽松货币政策
item.description: 世界银行预计，在外部和国内不确定性不断增加的情况下，泰国今年的货币政策将 "更加宽松"，其中包括总理钦那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）被暂时停职的政治危机。【原文：The World Bank expects Thailand’s monetary stance to become “more accommodative” this year amid mounting external and domestic uncertainty, including a political crisis that’s seen the temporary suspension of Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra.】

item.title: 本地基金加倍投资印度股票，买入金额达 400 亿美元
item.description: 国内机构投资者正在继续推动印度股票市场的发展，2025 年迄今为止的净购买量已接近去年创纪录的水平。【原文：Domestic institutional investors are continuing to power India’s equity markets, with net purchases so far in 2025 inching toward last year’s record influx.】

item.title: 立法者投票支持改革，韩国改革动力得到推动
item.description: 在韩国国会投票通过有助于保护小股东权益的改革之后，韩国雄心勃勃的提高公司治理标准计划得到了推动。【原文：South Korea’s ambitious plan to improve corporate governance standards got a boost after the parliament voted to approve changes that will help protect the rights of minority shareholders.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：斯塔默支持里夫斯，英镑收复失地
中国 DeepSeek 在 LinkedIn 上发布招聘信息，加大招聘力度
item.description: DeepSeek 正在加大在 LinkedIn 上的招聘力度，这表明这家中国人工智能初创公司可能正在寻求从本土以外吸引人才。【原文：DeepSeek is ramping up its recruitment on LinkedIn, suggesting the Chinese AI startup may be looking to lure talent from outside its homeland.】

item.title: 拉扎德为欧洲保险部门挖来 Evercore 的 Cotte
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc.【原文：Lazard Inc. has hired Cyrille Cotte from Evercore Inc. as head of insurance for its financial institutional group in Europe, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞银调查显示：央行更担心外汇 "武器化
item.description: 外汇 "武器化 "正日益令央行储备管理者头疼，这使他们有更多理由增持黄金。【原文：The “weaponization” of foreign exchange is posing a growing headache for central bank reserve managers, giving them more reason to boost their holdings of gold.】

item.title: 印尼为推动旅游业发展给予巴西和土耳其免签证入境待遇
item.description: 印度尼西亚为巴西和土耳其公民提供了免签证入境待遇，这在东南亚国家中实属罕见，旨在促进旅游和商业联系。【原文：Indonesia has extended visa-free entry to citizens of Brazil and Turkey, a rare privilege in the Southeast Asian nation aimed at boosting tourism and business ties.】

item.title: 日本 30 年期债券销售出现 2 月以来最强劲需求
item.description: 在周四举行的一次拍卖会上，投资者对 30 年期日本政府债券趋之若鹜，这表明政策制定者在平息债务市场波动方面取得了一定成效。【原文：Investors lapped up 30-year Japanese government bonds in an auction on Thursday that indicates policymakers are having some success in quelling debt-market volatility.】

item.title: 据说塔塔正在洽谈收购复苏中的投资者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，塔塔集团正在洽谈收购 Resurgent Power Ventures Pte 的其他股东。【原文：Tata Group is in talks to buy out other shareholders in Resurgent Power Ventures Pte, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 关税谈判影响前景，马来西亚降息押注增加
item.description: 人们越来越期待马来西亚央行在 7 月 9 日的政策会议上降息，这也是各国与美国达成贸易协议以避免巨额关税的最后期限。【原文：Expectations are growing for Malaysia’s central bank to cut interest rates at its policy meeting on July 9, which is also the deadline for countries to reach trade deals with the US to avert swingeing tariffs.】

item.title: 印度电商股盈利有望超越中国同行
item.description: 在过去的一个月里，印度顶级电子商务股票的表现超过了当地指数和地区同行，因为快速反弹助长了对这些股票超越对手和提高盈利能力的押注。【原文：India’s top e-commerce stocks have outpaced local indexes and regional peers over the past month, as a rapid rebound fuels bets on their ability to edge out rivals and boost profitability.】

item.title: 印度制造业因利润率和增长困境而失去动力
item.description: 由于利润缩水和增长放缓动摇了投资者的信心，这个支撑着曾经风靡一时的 "印度制造 "贸易的行业正摇摇欲坠。【原文：A sector that underpinned the once-popular “Make in India” trade is faltering as shrinking margins and slowing growth shakes investor confidence.】

item.title: 澳大利亚的新家用电池计划和零净排放竞赛
item.description:

item.title: 小投资者向印度股票投资 420 亿美元
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日本央行董事称暂时停止加息后将恢复加息
item.description: 日本央行董事会成员高田恒久（Hajime Takata）警告说，日本央行的加息周期将在 "只是 "暂时停顿之后重新开始，即使在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统威胁要对日本商品征收比之前吹嘘的还要高的关税，从而给经济前景蒙上阴影之后，他仍将保持鹰派基调。【原文：The Bank of Japan’s rate hike cycle will resume after “only” a temporary pause, Board Member Hajime Takata warned, keeping his hawkish tone even after President Donald Trump clouded the economic outlook by threatening to impose tariffs on Japanese goods even higher than those previously touted.】

item.title: AustralianSuper推进私募股权投资，四项新交易即将启动
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金澳大利亚储蓄基金（AustralianSuper）投资总监表示，该公司正在增加对非上市资产的配置，力争在年底前完成四笔私募股权交易。【原文：AustralianSuper is increasing its allocation to unlisted assets as the country’s biggest pension fund works to finalize four private equity deals by the end of the year, according to the firm’s investment chief.】

item.title: 富达基金加入改革乐观主义推动的韩国看涨浪潮
item.description: 富达国际（Fidelity International）的一位基金经理表示，由于公司治理改革的努力和恢复性盈利，韩国股市的上涨势头依然强劲。【原文：South Korea’s stock rally still has momentum due to corporate governance reform efforts and resilient earnings, according to a money manager at Fidelity International.】

item.title: 李在镕誓言重点振兴韩国濒临崩溃的经济
item.description: 韩国总统李在明周四在上个月就职以来的首次新闻发布会上发表讲话，承诺重振岌岌可危的经济并提高生活水平。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung pledged to revive the faltering economy and improve living standards, speaking Thursday in his first press conference since taking office last month.】

item.title: 债券交易员密切关注美国就业报告，寻找美联储利率线索
item.description: 美国国债市场的投资者在权衡美联储最快于本月降息的可能性时，正在关注周四一份至关重要的就业报告。【原文：Investors in the US Treasury market are zeroing in on a pivotal jobs report Thursday as they weigh the chances of the Federal Reserve cutting interest rates as soon as this month.】

item.title: 黄金创纪录反弹引发中国矿商募资热潮
item.description: 在创纪录的涨势中，投资者对黄金的兴趣不断升温，使其成为大宗商品中表现突出的品种。【原文：A wave of Chinese gold miners is pushing to raise funds in Hong Kong, seeking to capitalize on rising investor interest in the metal during a record-setting rally that’s made it a standout commodity performer.】

item.title: 中国服务业活动降至9个月新低，面临新的障碍
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国服务业活动下滑幅度超过预期，创下九个月新低。【原文：China’s services activity slipped more than forecast to reach a nine-month low, a private survey showed, a worry for the economy as higher US tariffs threaten exports.】

item.title: Cerberus 称，印度正热衷于更大规模的私人信贷交易
item.description: Cerberus Capital Management 公司董事总经理兼泛亚特殊情况部门主管 Indranil Ghosh 表示，市场对印度的大型私人信贷交易趋之若鹜，当地借款人的杠杆率通常低于亚洲其他地区的同行。【原文：The market is warming to large private credit deals in India, where local borrowers are typically less levered than their peers in the rest of Asia, according to Indranil Ghosh, managing director and head of pan-Asia special situations at Cerberus Capital Management.】

item.title: 亚洲对冲基金在被法国巴黎银行收购的基金经理处赢得更多分配资金
item.description: Axa IM Prime 是最近被法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）收购的全球资产管理公司的一部分，在过去五年中，该公司一直在增加对亚洲对冲基金经理的投资，因为美国机构的撤退使得该地区的对冲基金行业缺乏新鲜资金。【原文：Axa IM Prime, part of the global asset manager recently acquired by BNP Paribas SA, has been boosting its allocation to Asia hedge fund managers in the past five years, when the retreat of US institutions left the regional industry starved of fresh cash.】

item.title: 在美联储关注的就业数据公布前，黄金连涨三天后有所回落
item.description: 黄金在连涨三日后有所回落，周四晚些时候将公布关键的美国就业数据，该数据可能会影响美联储宽松货币政策的前景。【原文：Gold eased after a three-day gain, before pivotal US jobs data due later Thursday that may shape the outlook for the Federal Reserve’s monetary easing path.】

item.title: 西门子称美国已取消对华芯片软件限制
item.description: 西门子股份公司收到美国政府的通知，称华盛顿已解除对中国芯片设计软件的出口限制。【原文：Siemens AG has received a notice from the US government saying that Washington has lifted export restrictions on chip design software for China.】
